content: Alright, I'll leave it to you!{A两眼放光} Just spotted tons of shells on the beach, so I'm off for another hundred patrol laps to see what other fun stuff I can find~!
info: 沙滩和赶海-艾莎莎尼_主流程文本II

content: {A惊叹}<style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, come quick! There's a whole crab-lobster army out on the beach! They're totally asking for our shellfish tongs!
info: 沙滩和赶海-艾莎莎尼_主流程文本II

content: Who'd have thought nurturing a planet could be this full of surprises? {A喜欢}I'm already craving another round of last night's Steamed Seafood, swoosh~!
info: 沙滩和赶海-艾莎莎尼_主流程文本II

content: So, here you go — your trusty <style=Highlight>shellfish tongs</style>! Just pinch and scoop! You can put anything you catch in your Eco-Tank, or into a cooking pot, hehe~!
